Lack enough support: The claim that Emma Breier was used as a "crisis actor" for President Trump's hospital visit lacks sufficient evidence or credible sources to support it.
Problematic assumption: The claim is based on the assumption that the patient shown with the Trumps in the photograph is the same age as Emma Breier and that they bear a passing resemblance to each other, without any concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the patient shown in the photograph is not Emma Breier, but an adult survivor of the shooting, as confirmed by a representative from the hospital.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that all survivors treated at the hospital were adults, according to the hospital representative.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the photograph and implies a deliberate staging of the visit using "crisis actors" without sufficient evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence of any biases that understate or downplay the significance of the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of biases that make the claim falter at times.
